name: Dvis Music Bot
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

CHANNEL_ID.description: The Channel ID to fetch random videos from.

MONGO_DB_URL.description: Get a MongoDB URL from https://cloud.mongodb.com.

OWNER_ID.description: The user ID of the user whom you would like to add as OWNER.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, where logs will be sent.
